Package toxi.geom.mesh.subdiv


Class Summary
DisplacementSubdivision Abstract parent class for all displacement subdivision strategies.
DualDisplacementSubdivision This subdivision strategy splits an edge in three equal parts using two split points at 33% and 66% of the edge.
DualSubdivision This subdivision strategy splits an edge in three equal parts using two split points at 33% and 66% of the edge.
EdgeLengthComparator Comparator used by SubdivisionStrategy.getEdgeOrdering() to define the order of edges to be subdivided.
FaceCountComparator Comparator used by SubdivisionStrategy.getEdgeOrdering() to define the order of edges to be subdivided.
MidpointDisplacementSubdivision This subdivision strategy splits an edge in two equal halves at its mid point.
MidpointSubdivision This subdivision strategy simply splits an edge in two equal halves.
NormalDisplacementSubdivision This subdivision strategy splits an edge in two equal halves at its mid point.
SubdivisionStrategy This is the abstract parent class for all subdivision strategies.
TriSubdivision This subdivision strategy splits an edge in four equal parts using three split points at 25%, 50% and 75% of the edge.
